mapper.insert: insert into hq_board(no, title, content, regdate) values(my_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate )
mapper.update: update hq_board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, regdate = sysdate where no = #{no}
mapper.select: select no as no, title as title, content as content, regdate as regdate from hq_board

select rank, no as no, title as title, content as content, regdate as regdate from (select row_number() OVER(order by regdate desc) as rank, no, title, content, regdate from hq_board order by rank) where rank <= 5

select rank, no as no, title as title, content as content, regdate as regdate from (select row_number() OVER(order by regdate desc) as rank, no, title, content, regdate from hq_board order by rank) where rank >= #{beginBoardNo} and rank <= #{endBoardNo}
select no as no, title as title, content as content, regdate as regdate from hq_board where no = #{value}
select count(*) as boardTotalNo from hq_board
